content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map during these steps. Although pre‐existing smelting furnaces were utilized for resource conversion (an iron furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)), no additional buildings—such as the intended Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5)—were created or modified.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage for Entity Retrieval  
  – When invoking get_entities, use the correct signature. In one case a keyword argument (radius) was not accepted and later the function was called with multiple positional arguments. Confirm the API specification before use.

• Lab Placement and Existence Checks  
  – Before attempting to place a Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5), verify that a Lab is available in inventory.  
  – When filtering retrieved entities, ensure that a valid iterable is returned (e.g. use fallback defaults if the retrieval function returns None).

• Lab Crafting Ingredient Shortages  
  – Several lab crafting attempts failed due to missing sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable). Ensure that all required intermediate items are producible or available before initiating Lab crafting.  
  – Verify and complete the entire dependency chain (including prior smelting and intermediate crafting steps) to satisfy the lab recipe requirements.
